inventory module

class inventory.app.Goods(name, category, price_per_item, description, count_in_stock)[source]

Bases: Model

Model representing a good (product) in the store’s inventory.

Parameters:

  • id (int) – The ID of the product. Automatically generated by MySQL.

  • name (str) – The name of the product.

  • category (str) – The category of the product (e.g., food, clothes, electronics, etc.).

  • price_per_item (float) – The price of each individual item.

  • description (str) – A description of the product.

  • count_in_stock (int) – The number of available items in stock.

category
count_in_stock
description
id
name
price_per_item
query: t.ClassVar[Query]

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

inventory.app.add_good()[source]

Adds a new good to the inventory. :return: JSON response containing the added good’s details or an error message :rtype: dict

inventory.app.decrease_stock(good_name)[source]
inventory.app.delete_good(product_id)[source]

Deletes a product (good) from the database by its ID.

Parameters:

product_id (int) – The ID of the product to delete.

Returns:

JSON response indicating success or failure.

Return type:

flask.Response

inventory.app.get_all_goods()[source]
inventory.app.get_good_by_name(good_name)[source]
inventory.app.update_good_information(product_id)[source]

Updates the information of a specific product (good). The request can contain one or more fields to update (e.g., name, category, price_per_item, etc.). Only the provided fields will be updated, and the rest will remain unchanged.

Parameters:

product_id (int) – The ID of the product to update.

Returns:

A response indicating the success or failure of the update operation.

Return type:

Response

Raises:

404 Not Found if the product does not exist.

Raises:

400 Bad Request if no valid fields are provided for update.

Raises:

500 Internal Server Error if there is an issue during the update process.
